map_long_name: Measurement values wind speed, 10 min mean
map_abstract: Current 10-min values of the following meteorological parameters: Wind speed. SwissMetNet, the automatic monitoring network of MeteoSwiss, comprises about 160 automatic monitoring stations. These stations deliver a multitude of current data on the weather and climate in Switzerland every ten minutes. The monitoring network is supplemented by automatic precipitation stations. Together, these stations form the basis for the creation of reliable local weather forecasts as well as severe weather and flood warnings.
